meanings.definition: Superlative form of stealthy, characterized by quiet, cautious movement
meanings.sent1: The ninja moved with the stealthiest steps, making no sound at all.
meanings.sent2: She was known for being the stealthiest spy in the agency, always completing missions without being noticed.
meanings.sent3: The stealthiest cat in the neighborhood managed to steal treats from every house without anyone seeing.
meanings.sent4: His stealthiest approach to problem-solving involved quietly observing before making any moves.
meanings.sent5: The stealthiest movements of the wind through the trees created a peaceful atmosphere in the forest.

meanings.definition: Most sly or secretive in behavior or actions
meanings.sent1: The stealthiest fox in the forest always managed to outsmart the other animals.
meanings.sent2: He had the stealthiest smile, hiding his true intentions behind a friendly facade.
meanings.sent3: The stealthiest student in the class managed to sneak extra snacks without the teacher noticing.
meanings.sent4: Her stealthiest plan involved pretending to be asleep while secretly listening to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The stealthiest movements of the shadows revealed the hidden entrance to the secret cave.
